products.title: Google Pixel - Black
products.info: It has an extraordinary camera with features such as Night Sight, Super Res Zoom, Portrait Mode and HDR+. It features a battery that charges fast and lasts all day long. It also comes with three years of security and OS updates included. It’s everything you love about Google – in a phone

products.title: Samsung S7
products.info: It's not just a new phone. It brings a new way of thinking about what a phone can do. You defined the possibilities and we redefined the phone. The Galaxy S7 and S7 edge. Rethink what a phone can do.

products.title: HTC 10 - Black
products.info: HTC 10. It’s more of what you’re looking for in a flagship phone. Unparalleled performance. Superb 24-bit Hi-Res sound. The world’s first* Optical Image Stabilisation in both front and back cameras.
